00020 #include "MatWindow.h"

00022 MatWindow::MatWindow(QWidget *parent)
00023                  : QWidget(parent)
00024 {
00025     setWindowTitle(tr("View/Change Material"));
00026         setWindowFlags(Qt::Dialog);
00027         setMinimumSize(QSize(400, 500));
00028         setMaximumSize(QSize(400, 500));
00029 
00030         treeMat = new QTreeWidget(this);
00031         treeMat->setHeaderLabels(QStringList("Sub Entities"));
00032         treeMat->setMinimumSize(150, 150);
00033         connect(treeMat, SIGNAL(itemClicked(QTreeWidgetItem*, int)), this, SLOT(processMat(QTreeWidgetItem*)));
00034 
00035         textureLbl = new QLabel("Texture Preview");
00036         textureLbl->setPixmap(tr(":/images/ogre.png"));
00037         textureLbl->setMinimumSize(150, 150);
00038 
00039         matText = new QTextEdit;
00040         matText->setMinimumSize(300, 200);
00041         connect(matText, SIGNAL(textChanged()), this, SLOT(updateTexture()));
00042 
00043         //Textures
00044         viewTexture = new QGroupBox(tr("View Texture"));
00045 
00046         treeTextureLayout = new QHBoxLayout;
00047         treeTextureLayout->addWidget(treeMat);
00048         treeTextureLayout->addWidget(textureLbl);
00049 
00050         viewTexture->setLayout(treeTextureLayout);
00052 
00053         //Material
00054         viewMat = new QGroupBox(tr("View Material"));
00055 
00056         matLayout = new QVBoxLayout;
00057         matLayout->addWidget(matText);
00058 
00059         viewMat->setLayout(matLayout);
00061 
00062         //Btn
00063         groupBtn = new QGroupBox;
00064         groupBtn->setFlat(true);
00065 
00066     okBtn = new QPushButton(tr("&Ok"));
00067         okBtn->setMaximumSize(QSize(75, 25));
00068         connect(okBtn, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(saveMat()));
00069     cancelBtn = new QPushButton(tr("&Cancel"));
00070         cancelBtn->setMaximumSize(QSize(75, 25));
00071     connect(cancelBtn, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(close()));
00072 
00073         btnLayout = new QGridLayout;
00074 
00075         btnLayout->addWidget(okBtn, 0, 1);
00076     btnLayout->addWidget(cancelBtn, 0, 2);
00077         btnLayout->setAlignment(okBtn, Qt::AlignRight & Qt::AlignBottom);
00078         btnLayout->setAlignment(cancelBtn, Qt::AlignRight & Qt::AlignBottom);
00079 
00080     groupBtn->setLayout(btnLayout);
00082 
00083         gridLayout = new QVBoxLayout;
00084         gridLayout->addWidget(viewTexture);
00085         gridLayout->addWidget(viewMat);
00086         gridLayout->addWidget(groupBtn);
00087         setLayout(gridLayout);
00088 
00089         scriptPath += QDir::currentPath()+"/media/materials/scripts/";
00090         texturePath += QDir::currentPath()+"/media/materials/textures/";
00091         posMat = -1;
00092         nextMat = -1;
00093         strAllMat = "";
00094 }

00098

00101 void MatWindow::setScriptPath(QString path)
00102 {
00103         scriptPath = path;
00104         scriptPath += "/";
00105 }
00106 
00107 void MatWindow::setTexturePath(QString path)
00108 {
00109         texturePath = path;
00110         texturePath += "/";
00111 }

00113 void MatWindow::setTexture(Ogre::Entity* ent)
00114 {
00115         //Remove old materials
00116         for(int i=0; i<=treeMat->topLevelItemCount(); ++i){
00117                 QTreeWidgetItem* item = treeMat->topLevelItem(i);
00118                 delete item;
00119                 item = treeMat->takeTopLevelItem(i);
00120                 delete item;
00121                 item = 0;
00122         }
00123         QTreeWidgetItem* item = treeMat->takeTopLevelItem(0);
00124         delete item;
00125         item = 0;
00126 
00127         //add new materials
00128         for(unsigned int i=0; i<ent->getNumSubEntities(); ++i){
00129                 QTreeWidgetItem* item = new QTreeWidgetItem(treeMat);
00130                 item->setText(0, ent->getSubEntity(i)->getMaterialName().c_str());
00131         }
00132         treeMat->setCurrentItem(treeMat->topLevelItem(0));
00133         QTreeWidgetItem* currentItem = treeMat->currentItem();
00134 
00135         processMat(currentItem);
00136 }
00137 
00138 void MatWindow::processMat(QTreeWidgetItem* currentItem)
00139 {
00140         if(currentItem != 0){
00141                 //clean old values
00142                 strAllMat = "";
00143                 matText->clear();
00144                 textureLbl->setPixmap(QPixmap(""));
00145                 textureLbl->setText("Texture Unavailable");
00146                 //We'll seek for the material to include it in matText.
00147                 QDir dir(scriptPath);
00148                 QStringList listFiles(dir.entryList(QDir::Files));
00149                 for(int i=0; i<listFiles.size(); ++i){
00150                         if(checkMat(listFiles.at(i)) != ""){//the file has the good extension (.material)
00151                                 QFile file(dir.path()+listFiles.at(i));
00152                                 if(file.open(QIODevice::ReadWrite)){
00153                                         QTextStream script(&file);
00154                                         //Search our mat
00155                                         QString strMat = script.readAll();
00156                                         QString nameMat("material "+currentItem->text(0));
00157                                         posMat = strMat.indexOf(nameMat);
00158                                         if(posMat != -1){
00159                                                 matText->setPlainText(strMat);//insert all the text and keep it in strAllMat
00160                                                 strAllMat = matText->toPlainText();
00161                                                 matText->clear();//clear it so the user don't see anything
00162 
00163                                                 //Process: we cut the beginning of the string. Then we cut all others material
00164                                                 //So we only have the material wich interest us
00165                                                 strMat.remove(0, posMat);//we cut the firt part of the string
00166                                                 nextMat = strMat.indexOf("material ", 8);//search the next material at pos 8 because we want the next material (not the first one)
00167                                                 if(nextMat != -1)
00168                                                         strMat.remove(nextMat, strMat.size());//we cut from this next material to the end so we only have the material we want
00169 
00170                                                 //Processing strMat
00171                                                 for(int i=0; i<strMat.size(); ++i){
00172                                                         if(strMat.at(i) == '\t'){
00173                                                                 strMat.replace(i, 1, "          ");
00174                                                         }
00175                                                 }
00176                                                 matText->setPlainText(strMat);
00177                                                 QFont f("Arial", 8);
00178                                                 matText->setFont(f);
00179 
00180                                                 //Now we're looking for the texture
00181                                                 int posText = strMat.indexOf("texture ");
00182                                                 if(posText != -1){
00183                                                         QString textureName;
00184                                                         for(int i=posText+8; i<strMat.size(); ++i){
00185                                                                 textureName += strMat.at(i);
00186                                                         }
00187                                                         textureName.truncate(textureName.indexOf('.'));
00188                                                         QPixmap img;
00189                                                         if(img.load(texturePath+textureName)){
00190                                                                 img = img.scaled(150, 150);
00191                                                                 textureLbl->setText(textureName);
00192                                                                 textureLbl->setPixmap(img);
00193                                                         }
00194                                                         else
00195                                                                 textureLbl->setText("Image Unavailable");
00196                                                 }
00197                                                 matFile.setFileName(file.fileName());//Finally we keep matFile in memory so that we can open the file later --> saveMat()
00198                                         }
00199                                 }
00200                                 file.close();
00201                         }
00202                 }
00203         }
00204 }
00205 
00206 void MatWindow::saveMat()
00207 {
00208         if(!QMessageBox::question(this, tr("Overwrite File?"), tr("Do you want to overwrite material ")+treeMat->currentItem()->text(0)+tr(" with the new one?"), tr("&Yes"), tr("&No"))){
00209                 QFile filename(matFile.fileName());
00210                 if(!filename.open(QFile::WriteOnly | QFile::Text | QFile::Truncate ))
00211                         QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Application"), tr("Cannot write file %1:\n%2.") .arg(matFile.fileName()) .arg(filename.errorString()));
00212                 else{
00213                         QTextStream script(&filename);
00214                         QApplication::setOverrideCursor(Qt::WaitCursor);
00215 
00216                         QString nameMat("material "+treeMat->currentItem()->text(0));
00217                         int posToReplace = strAllMat.indexOf(nameMat);
00218                         if(posToReplace != -1){
00219                                 int nextPosToReplace = strAllMat.indexOf("material ", posToReplace+8);
00220                                 if(nextPosToReplace != -1){
00221                                         strAllMat.replace(posToReplace, nextPosToReplace - posToReplace, matText->toPlainText());
00222                                         script << strAllMat;
00223                                 }
00224                                 else{
00225                                         strAllMat.replace(posToReplace, strAllMat.size() - posToReplace, matText->toPlainText());
00226                                         script << strAllMat;
00227                                 }
00228                                 emit(msgBoxClicked());
00229                         }
00230                         else
00231                                 QMessageBox::warning(this, "Problem", "There was a problem when saving...");
00232 
00233                         QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
00234                         close();
00235                 }
00236         }
00237 }
00238 
00239 QString MatWindow::checkMat(QString str)
00240 {
00241         QStringList listStr = str.split('.');
00242         if(listStr.at(1) == "material")
00243                 return listStr.at(0);
00244         else
00245                 return "";
00246 }
00247 
00248 void MatWindow::updateTexture()
00249 {
00250         QString allTxt = matText->toPlainText();
00251         int posText = allTxt.indexOf("texture ");
00252         if(posText != -1){
00253                 QString textureName;
00254                 for(int i=posText+8; i<allTxt.size(); ++i){
00255                         textureName += allTxt.at(i);
00256                 }
00257                 textureName.truncate(textureName.indexOf('.'));
00258                 QPixmap img;
00259                 if(img.load(texturePath+textureName)){
00260                         img = img.scaled(150, 150);
00261                         textureLbl->setText(textureName);
00262                         textureLbl->setPixmap(img);
00263                 }
00264                 else
00265                         textureLbl->setText("Image Unavailable");
00266         }
00267 }
